channel.title: zulucrypt failed to start helper application
channel.description:
i have innstalled Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.ova and made all updates.
i try to launch zulucrypt but i get this error: zulucrypt failed to start helper application polkit file is misconfigured zulupolkit executable could not be found or pkexec failed to start zulupolkit
what is wrong and what can i do to solve thiS?

item.title: zulucrypt failed to start helper application
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Does zulucrypt work for everyone now?

If not, then this might help as per cannot access encrypted USB drive with Thunar in Whonix 15

sudo apt install libblockdev-crypto2

Read full topic
item.source: zulucrypt failed to start helper application

item.title: zulucrypt failed to start helper application
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
pkexec related fixes are available in latest stable download and through stable in-place upgrades too.

Dunno about zulucrypt. See also:

  • cannot access encrypted USB drive with Thunar in Whonix 15
  • cannot use pkexec

Read full topic

item.title: zulucrypt failed to start helper application
